name: Arctic Run 3D
description:
In Arctic Run you guide a penguin who's running to collect his dinner!

Watch out for the obstacles in his path though and beware of the polar bears!

With simple controls, just tap the left or right side of the screen to move and collect as many fish as you can!


Features:

Cute Graphics
Pseudo 3D Effects
Game Center
Fun Sounds and Music
Highly Addictive Gameplay
Simple Gameplay suitable for Kids
